Review.Contenu: Baselane banking doesn't deliver the card. Have been requesting help for close to a month and nothing, only thing they say is "please wait". If you are looking to have a card attached to your bank account, Baselane Banking isn't for you.

Review.Titre: I hate to write bad reviews
Review.Contenu: I hate to write bad reviews, but my experience has been terrible. They made this switch to a new bank account internally, which is okay. It is a pain, and I dont want to update my information on a bunch of account, but okay. I get it.  I updated my bank information for everything that is on autopayment with the newest information, and now everything is getting returned. My loan payments? Failed. My Condo Fees? Failed. I have hundreds in return check fees and late fees due, and I did everything to update the information.  Support? Useless. They keep telling me that i must not have updated the account information.  I did! I sent screen shots showing that I updated it.  The response? Well, you must not have updated your bank information.  Sent more screenshots!  The Response? Well, we dont see any problems on our side so I will forward the request to the bank. WTFFFFFFF. WHERE IS THE MONEY!?! What do you mean you are going to send the request to the bank?  that has been days ago, and people are reaching out saying I owe money.  Rent is due tomorrow, and will I get paid? Who knows? Maybe the money just disappears into thin air. WHERE IS MY MONEY AND WHY CANT I SPEND IT??

The customer service representative was friendly. However, I was told it would take up to one month to receive check from the closure of my account.1 month seems like an absurd amount of time in today’s world of technology. I asked for a electronic transfer but was informed only a check could be sent.

This site is a joke - the interface is amateur, and nothing works. I tried for hours to remove the property I had put in and could not do it. A support call was scheduled, and the guy didn't show - got an email two hours later saying 'didn't feel well' and couldn't make it. I've received two unsolicitied sales calls from them and now **can't get them to close my account.** Total amateur site from start to finish. Can't reach them by telephone - infinite loop to a recording and leaving a message. Calls not returned. Like phoning a frat house rather than a business.update 13 May: my review was hidden for over a week after being flagged for being 'harmful or illegal.' The same day, the Baselane COO contacted me on my personal email, requesting a personal phone call to discuss ... what. This created a certain air of menace. A C-level executive, who once was a consultont for Boston Consulting Group. I replied I was confident my review reflected my experience and I would not retract it. Given his bizarre response, I again urge anyone seeking a rental management/payment system to look elsewhere. Or just use one of the no-fee cash-based payment apps.

Review.Titre: Still can't access my payment that was…
Review.Contenu: Still can't access my payment that was sent in 8 days ago.  Can't get ahold of anyone but a bot.  Have sent multiple emails and left voice mail on message machine.

Review.Titre: Baselane is one of the worst…
Review.Contenu: Baselane is one of the worst disappointments I ever had in 10 years dealing with real estate.When I was first introduce to their customer service everything went really smooth and had daily follow ups with their team until I decided to move my portafolio to to be manage by this company, from that moment on the entire experience went sideways, my tenants reported to me they had to wait days to get their accounts confirm, from there setting up automatic payments took them weeks to manage, and to actually see funds almost a month!I expected this process to be "normal" as it was the first time setting up the accounts, but to my surprise the problems went on and on, the second red flag is when I first set an ACH to my insurance company, one of the "benefits" this company offered, to my surprise those payments were rejected due to a miss match of my name.After 1 week of daily emails, phone calls with their staff, the only response I got was that unfortunately they cannot ensure 100% of payments through them can be guarantee, I initially though the customer representative wasn't knowledgeable of this aspect so I requested to speak to their manager, and 3 days later I was told that at this moment this website does not have this capabilities, can you imagine setting up mortgage payments, contractors, insurance companies, or any other provider that relies on the efficiency of this system and been told that even the CEO of the company did not find a way to ensure payments were set up reliable! Well I learn this the hard way and to put this in context I only moved 5 properties at the time, for those with larger portafolio be aware of this limitations upfront and avoid a headache.

Review.Titre: Poor customer service. Not suited for small landlords.
Review.Contenu: The chat help function promised to give a response in 2 hours concerning a payment made 2 business days ago. Customer service did not respond and then 2 days later I received an email notice the payment when through. Then the next day the payment was reversed by another email sent at 5am. I had returned another payment from the tenant as a result of the notice the payment went through. For small landlords the accounting benefits of Baselane do not outweigh the poor customer service of this financial platform.

Review.Titre: UPDATED: Takes responsibility for mistakes. ORIGINAL: Completely incompetent
Review.Contenu: UPDATED: Revising from 1 to 4 stars. See original review below due to two factors. First, the account was magically opened a week or so after I wrote this. Then a few days later, one of their Customer Support Team people I was working with wrote a very detailed explanation and apology for the way this was handled. We did a call regarding the matter and she went over all of the steps in which the process failed on their end, as well as the ways in which they are going to use this experience to improve their service. Given how rarely this happens nowadays that any company takes responsibility and action in such a transparent way, we're going to go ahead and set up our Baselane account. Completely incompetent. We are a self-managed HOA that was really excited about the prospect of using a single platform integrated with banking for our needs. It took them SIX WEEKS to 'review' our application for a bank account. After multiple escalations and explanations they requested the same exact documents which we told them we do not have (as in they do not exist because of our formation status). Pretty much forced us to waste all that time. The negative review is not because they declined to open the account (although we have had no issue opening bank accounts with the same documentation in the past.) It's because of the length of time this took and the total lack of even so much as a boilerplate apology in the end. In reply to my final email to them asking to explain how on earth we landed right back to where we started, I got "I'm going to go ahead and close this conversation for housekeeping 😊." I wouldn't trust them with anything.

Review.Titre: User friendly, great banking benefits, some features have room for improvement
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using Baselane for a month now for one property and it’s great so far! I’ve already received cash back for home improvement purchases and enjoy the high APY. The website is intuitive, but the mobile experience could be expanded as not all features are available through it and I rarely use my laptop. There should be a way to filter out external accounts from the net cash flow analysis because it makes the data inaccurate and is frustrating. Despite these flaws, I trust that the company will make improvements. I love the fact that I can customize rent payments as it lets me charge tenants one time fees. Tenants seem to have an easy time on boarding as well. I have not reached out to customer service yet so I cannot speak to the experience. Overall, highly recommended, and have already invited friends to the platform.

Review.Titre: Baselane has systematized and given us…
Review.Contenu: Baselane has systematized and given us control over our rent collection system. Baselane is a fairly new company. Challenges and updates occur regularly. Their customer support, especially Larissa, assigned to our portfolio has been great at working with us and solving these challenges together. I recommend Baselane to anyone looking for a more professional rent collection system.

Review.Titre: [Rectified] Terrible customer service. Not a platform designed for real estate investors
Review.Contenu: I've been trying to get my mortgage approved and one of the statements my lender requires is a copy of my Baselane statement. Turns out, Baselane is just a software service and banks with Blue Ridge Bank. Which means my lender will not accept Baselane's statement and will only accept a statement with Blue Ridge Bank's logo and URL.I've contacted support many many times over 2 weeks with customer service rep Eric. Eric told me they'd look into it -- no follow up in 1 week. Then I followed up again to give them instructions on what I need on the statement. Eric told me he'd contact Blue Ridge Bank -- nothing. I followed up multiple times after that, and Eric stopped responding. I called 3 times in the course of 1 week, at different times, and was sent to voicemail every. single. time.As a software made for landlords, I imagine I'm not the only one who's applying to mortgages. If I can't even get a legitimate statement from Baselane, why would I use your platform?Potential users looking to sign up: Don't. You'll get poor customer serviceUPDATE: Baselane took care of this problem in the end. Larissa from the Customer Success team was very helpful and helped me resolve this issue as soon as she found out. Originally gave a 1 star review but changing it to 4. I wish we never had this problem but their team did a great job managing it afterwards.

Review.Titre: Truly Designed for Real Estate Investors
Review.Contenu: Baselane truly understands the banking needs of Real Estate investors & Landlords. I love being able to quickly create different accounts per entity, property, or unit all in one place. Automatically Categorizing transactions will make tax time so much easier. So many tools and features that you just do NOT get with other institutions.

I have only been using the platform for a few months, But the customer service is outstanding. My partner and I are new to the industry and working through setting up our first asset has had its ups and downs. Larissa at Baselane has made that portion of our business so much easier. I have asked her dozens of questions at this point and she is always responsive and helpful. I am optimistic about the future as our portfolio grows in complexity!

Review.Titre: Highly valuable features, worth the small annoyances
Review.Contenu: We’ve been on Baselane for about 18 months and utilize most features, including rent collection, on a handful of properties. Overall, we are pretty happy with it — going in we knew it was a newer company and didn’t expect everything would be perfect, but the features like no cost banking, multiple accounts to hold security deposits and checking per property, high APYs and built in accounting reports made it worth it. There have been some technical bugs along the way and some features have been marked as “coming soon” for the entirety of our account with them, which we would like to see one day. But support has been responsive and has helped us work through any annoying product bugs as we have encountered them. Recommend to other landlords!
Excellent tool. It's a fantastic tool for those who want to have better control and organization over their tenants. Easy to use. I used it based on a recommendation, and I don't regret it.

Larissa,  Has been the only reason that I can stay with Baselane.  I have not found it particularly intuitive but I value its offerings...the good interest rate on my deposits so I don't have to move rents to a different bank, the separate bank accounts for my properties within the platform, the ability to designate exactly what deposits and withdrawals are for making tax time easier (I hope!), the automatic tenant billing/payments  etc. SO, the fact that she is there to consult when I hit snags is invaluable....and actually the very reason that I am able to stay with Baselane.  She is patient and most important very competent and knowledgeable.  I have a PhD in English, not accounting or business.  Having her  clear familiarity with your site is a real service to me.

I'm a new landlord of a 3 family owner-occupied home. I chose Baselane to maintain separate finances of my personal unit vs my rental units, collect rent online, and manage all expenses. The service has been excellent, as has the customer service. They are continuing to roll out new features, and it's by far the easiest/nicest UI out of all of the competition I've reviewed. Very happy to continue to use this service, makes my life a little bit easier.

Review.Titre: I enjoy how simple it is to set up rent…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy how simple it is to set up rent collection, reminders for tenant payments and late fee charges. No fees for myself or my tenant.

Review.Titre: Updated to a five star review
Review.Contenu: Initially, I struggled to communicate with the people at baseline But I wanted to update my review and give them a five star Because I got ahold of their customer service and they did an amazing  job! Larissa Provided first class service. I come from the customer service industry and was overwhelmed by her support.

Review.Titre: Lots of perks, easy to use
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the 4.25% returns and perks for referrals or cash for spending in certain categories. As a landlord I enjoy how simple it is to set up rent collection, reminders for tenant payments and late fee charges.  No fees for myself or my tenant.

This company is responsive. They have really thought about their customer's needs. They don't try to nickel and dime you. It's like they thought what would a dream company be like and tried to create it.I just wish they had a few other statements like Profit and Loss and more flexibility with setting late fees. Other than those, I love it!

Review.Titre: Good one and not sure but looking for…
Review.Contenu: Good one and not sure but looking for support

We have had a great experience using Baselane. Once the account was set up, collecting rent has been straightforward and your deposits earn good interest. Collecting rent online has helped streamline our work. Customer support is excellent too.

I love how intuitive it is to learn. It is robust enough to serve my needs, yet easy and intuitive to learn. They have been rolling out new features and updates regularly. I am using it for my personal properties (7). And, look forward to moving over the properties that I manage under my property management brokerage.
Good online bank. I like Baselane, it's website is easy to use and understand, has good support, and good rates (APR). No hidden fees and straightforward.

Review.Titre: Baselane is honestly the best rental property software
Review.Contenu: Baselane is honestly the best rental property software out there. I've tried many different tools and they are all really expensive and/or simply don't work. I highly recommend any new or experience landlord or property management team use Baselane.

Review.Titre: Great service for anyone with rental property…
Review.Contenu: The set up process took a little while to complete, but since the account has been up and running it has been incredibly useful and timesaving. Receiving rental payments has gone perfectly, and none of our tenants has had any problem with registering with Baselane. And the bookkeeping procedures and ability to link external accounts and categorize all transactions and have them summarized in an itemized way makes keeping track of everything a breeze.
We've been using Baselane for a few months now. Service works well and the customer service is very helpful. They are receptive to UI/UX feedback and are very responsive. So far, so good.
Baselane has been wonderful. I listed 4 units with them, including utilizing their banking and it’s been seamless.  One less thing to worry about.
A time saver! Very easy to setup and the high interest rate banking account  makes it a winner. The customer support team was very responsive to every question I had.
Baselane is the best. The best it ever was.Loved it. Chak de patte
Good application.  It has the necessary components to Rent/lease property

Baselane is such a nice, easy to navigate, integrated tool for managing rental property cash flow, and unlike other options doesn't require signing up for a bank account to handle rental payments (though the bank account is great with an excellent interest rate too)!
I love this bank, their website is great and customer service is awsome

Very happy with baselane. I'm treasurer of small homeowners association. Baselane automates and simplifies effort of collecting fees, maintaining books, paying suppliers, and providing reports. Would highly recommend the service.
Just as advertised.  High rates, great promotions, easy rent collections.

Review.Titre: I started using for rent collection for…
Review.Contenu: I started using for rent collection for rental properties. So far happy with the product and customer service.
Simple and easy! And free!
Easy to use platform.  Quick service. Very landlord and tenant friendly!
Baselane is the best tool/bank for a first-time landlord.
Great service, Easy to use portal, Great customer service

Review.Titre: Easy to use and has all the tools you…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use and has all the tools you need
Great platform for rental payments. Smooth and easy!

Review.Titre: Very easy to use for both tenants and…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use for both tenants and landlords.

Review.Titre: Happy with customer service so far

Review.Contenu: Very helpful team, I am happy with their support.
